attributes.action: to call an immediate general election due to lack of trust in the present parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Democracy relies upon trust in our elected representatives. without this a repesentative democracy cannot function. All trust in the current parliament is lost and cannot be recovered. I call upon the Prime Minister to restore faith in our representative system by immediately calling a general election. Only the election of a new parliament can restore the publics trust.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
